content: *three classic cable patterns give this project lots of character and style lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # l20303 corrections applied jun 19 2015 stitch diagram corrected corrections applied apr 17 2013 *diagram corrected and clarifications made * photo tutorial available here 1 skill level intermediate + level 4 vanna s choice® article #860 12 balls *shown in linen* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm special stitches bpdc back post double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet bptr back post treble_crochet fptr front post treble_crochet fptrcross worked over 3 sts pattern stitches cable pattern 1 worked over 3 stitches 4 row cable pattern 2 worked over 11 stitches 4 row cable pattern 3 worked over 17 stitches 4 row three different cable patterns are worked across each row crochet cable pattern charts are provided *free registration at site required to access pattern * a kit that includes yarn and pattern is also available on the lion brand site article # l20303k 2 1 http //www lionbrand com/blog/crochet-lion-brand-celtic-afghan/ 2 http //www lionbrand com/6030/pictpage/1922262764 html
